transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to reschedule an appointment I have coming up.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Maria Santos. I have an appointment this Thursday at 2pm that I need to reschedule.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Maria. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's July 22, 1979.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your name is Maria Santos, and your date of birth is July twenty second nineteen seventy nine. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is spelled M-A-R-I-A, and my last name is S-A-N-T-O-S.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. If you're not sure, just let me know, and I'll confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, you can use my phone number. It's 555-876-4321.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I have your phone number as five five five eight seven

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. 555-876-4321.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: got it. I have your phone

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Great, thank you. Could I please reschedule my appointment to sometime next week? I'm available Monday, Tuesday, or Friday, any time.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm having trouble pulling up your record in the system. I can't reschedule your appointment right now. I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you as soon as possible. Please stay on the line while I document your request.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you, I appreciate your help. I'll wait.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer isn't available right now since this is a demo clinic.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Could you please let the support team know I need to reschedule my appointment for next week? I'll wait for them to get back to me. Thank you!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thanks for your help. Have a great day!
